txt.en: The stories say that back in old Bullroarer's time, the arrival of Golfimbul's goblins were presaged by an invasion of wolves much like the one people are seeing these days. That cannot be a good sign.

Wolves? Goblins? Dark Powers? Well, if that is what is meant to be, then that is what will be -- but you have got mettle enough to see it through, and you wager that any self-styled Dark Lord will get a fair bit more than he bargained for if he sets his eyes on the brave folk of the Shire.
